workflow.title: Get TP53 Mutations By Intron
workflow.description: This workflow takes the intron and the TP53 somatic mutation database as input and retrieve the full TP53 somatic mutation description(s) by first retrieving the TP53 somatic mutation database unique IDs associated with the input (done via a call to the getP53MutationIdsByIntron web service) and then using IDs for retrieving the full TP53 somatic mutations descriptions (done via a call to the getP53MutationsByIds web service).Special requirements on input data are:- The intron range of numbers is 2-11,- when specifying more than one intron, they must be in a unique input string but on distinct text lines
